title: How merge VistaPE and LiveXP on one CD

forumNotes.author: RadstaR
forumNotes.content: Can anybody help me, how i can add VistaPE and LiveXP on one CD/DVD ?

forumNotes.author: RadstaR
forumNotes.content: No tips how i can do it ? I need VistaPE and XPPE on one CD/DVD.

forumNotes.author: Brito
forumNotes.content:
eheh.. You should give us 15 minutes before bumping your topic.. ![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif)   

Have you used the search function?  

This sort of topic has been mentioned several times before, look on the VistaPE subforum for a lot of related topics. VistaPE has built in support for grub so you should only need to worry about add LiveXP boot from Grub and take it from there to join onto your project.  

:wink:

forumNotes.author: RadstaR
forumNotes.content:
Yes, I can ![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif) but ...... ok i try search again and again.  
I felt couple modification of Grub, but nothing works. Yes i am beginner lama :wink:
